mutants.code:
def calculate_minimum_cost(m, q, n, prices):
    min_q = min(q)
    sorted_prices = sorted(prices, reverse=True)
    total_cost = sum(sorted_prices)
    free_items_cost = sum(sorted_prices[min_q::min_q + 2]) - sum(sorted_prices[min_q + 1::min_q + 2])
    return total_cost - free_items_cost

def calculate_minimum_cost(m, q, n, prices):
    min_q = min(q)
    sorted_prices = sorted(prices, reverse=True)
    total_cost = sum(sorted_prices)
    free_items_cost = sum(sorted_prices[min_q::min_q + 2]) * sum(sorted_prices[min_q + 1::min_q + 2])
    return total_cost - free_items_cost

def calculate_minimum_cost(m, q, n, prices):
    min_q = min(q)
    sorted_prices = sorted(prices, reverse=True)
    total_cost = sum(sorted_prices)
    free_items_cost = sum(sorted_prices[min_q::min_q + 2]) + sum(sorted_prices[min_q + 1::min_q + 2])
    return total_cost + free_items_cost
